name: Breathing Space (ickci)
description:
Defeat / Avoid Enemies to avoid being pushed into spikes

Controls:

Move: A and D (keyboard), Left Stick (controller)

Jump: Space(keyboard), A / button0 (controller)

f5 toggles between full and windowed.

protip: you can jump again after defeating an enemy.

Graphics: Aseprite, Engine: Unity, Sfx: BFXR, Music?: Bosca Ceoil.
